nodes.text: The Vergesso Asteroids were an asteroid field where the bounty hunter Dengar got into trouble during the Imperial Era.

Dengar's girlfriend, Manaroo, contacted a group of spacers and met them in the outskirts of Mos Entha on the planet Tatooine, where she implored them to help her rescue Dengar from the Vergesso Asteroids.

In the new Star Wars canon, the Vergesso Asteroids were first mentioned in the 2020 Fantasy Flight Games Star Wars Roleplaying supplement, Starships and Speeders. The asteroid field originated in the 1996 Star Wars Legends novel Shadows of the Empire, which was written by Steve Perry.
